dcterms:creator: D. L. Chen
W. B. Dolan
dcterms:description: The YouTube2Text dataset consists of 1,970 video clips with multiple natural language descriptions for each video clip, covering a wide range of topics such as sports, animals, music, and movie clips.
dcterms:title: YouTube2Text

dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: UCF101 is a dataset containing 101 action classes from 13,320 YouTube video clips, featuring a variety of human actions subject to large camera motion, viewpoint change, and cluttered backgrounds.
dcterms:title: UCF101

dcterms:creator: A. Karpathy
G. Toderici
S. Shetty
T. Leung
R. Sukthankar
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: Sport 1 Million is a large-scale dataset designed for video classification, containing a million videos across various sports categories.
dcterms:title: Sport 1 Million
